title: The Return of Chico | Ep. 10
itunes:title: The Return of Chico | Ep. 10
description:
The fans requested Chico but we're not sure if Karlous or DC knew he was returning or if they wanted him to return. Either way he's here and he's talking Wild N Out, DC joining the cast, what to expect for the new season and tell us exactly how the Old School Battle started (but still haven't figured out who stole who's rhymes). Oh yeah & DC tells a crazy story. Listen up.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
